cast.name: 帕提特·披斯缇奎 Pathit Pisitkul
阿塔潘·彭萨瓦 Atthaphan Phunsawat
缇卡彭·瑞塔阿芘楠 Thikumporn Rittapinun
帕拉布·尤他毕查 Prab Yuttapichai
拉皮帕·埃潘库 Rapeepat Eakpankul

introduction: Ming is a girl who lives with her grandfather and grandmother. Her grandfather hates her because her mother escaped with her grandfather and left her with him. So she tries to learn and make good things for them. In reality her grandfather loves her but he doesn't say anything because he still hates her mother. Her family has a food shop near an apartment.Prik came from the country and lives in this apartament. He usually comes to eat at her store and he and Ming are always bickering. Time passes, Prik becomes a doctor and Ming becomes a nurse.
